summary: A spell allows you teleport back to the Asteria (the modded house
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]What does this mod do"[/u][/b]

Add a spellbook which can teach player use the spell to teleport to Asteria.
I do really like The Asteria , i want to back here every time when I go home, so I make a spell for it. :D
I know there is portal to the ship, but you can use this spell teleport to the ship anywhere and anytime.
[b]
[u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
 
You will need have the house mod : The Asteria V1.1( link blow)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13641/tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D13641&pUp=1

[u][b]install:[/b][/u]

Download the file and over write the esp file, you will find the book on the top of bed which located in the Asteria's bedroom.

[b][u]Personal thanks:[/u][/b]

thanks to the [b]Pegasuraptor, he make the mod Return home(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20624/?)
[/b]so I just used his mod and make my little magic. Hope he doesn't mind :D
(should really thank him, it saves a lot of time.) 

[b][u]oh, and welcome him to take this one as an optional file to his mod[/u][/b]
author: BinaryMilk
